title: Man Medium Skin Tone White Hair
description: Depicts a man with medium skin tone and white hair. It can represent an older man, someone with naturally white hair, or be used for stylistic purposes.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this distinguished gentleman emoji presents with a warm, medium skin tone and a full head of neatly styled white hair, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges. The glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting emphasize a refined and mature appearance, conveying wisdom, experience, or perhaps a touch of gentle seniority in digital conversations.
